website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for gifting or travel, these unbreakable silicone wine glasses offer excellent portability and taste.
pros: Can be folded into pocket for easy traveling
Made of top quality food-grade silicone for safe drinking
cons: Wine can spill down chin if users aren't careful
Holding can be awkward since the silicone is flexible

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t break and the party goes on!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are fun and serve the purpose! They hold wine (or whatever drink) and don’t break! I used one all of New Years Eve. I bought them to use on our back patio during the warmer seasons. I’ve broken too many wine glasses now. Dropped, kicked over. Now the only possible loss is the drink itself! Maybe there should be silicone lids. Ha. Anyway, great product, doesn’t smell, doesn’t appear to stain with red wine. Haven’t tried the dishwasher yet, I’ve only washed by hand. A little awkward to drink out of at first with the feel, a thicker edge, etc., but you get used to it. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Geyer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great glasses
customer_reviews.text: We just ‘like’ these glasses. We keep them around the pool as they are unbreakable. The opening is a little small and we found it awkward to drink from. They are also a little flimsy. We do not fill them up to the rim. Don’t let uncle “John” have is 10th glasses of wine on these ! ! ! ! Good glasses, but not “great” glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Catpoches

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: My parents were going camping for their anniversary so I gave them 2 of these wine glasses and a bottle of wine to take with them and they loved it! They sent me a picture of them drinking from the glasses at their campsite. It was so cute-i wish I could put the picture here but I don’t want to embarrass them. It would be great for advertising though!-ha! I love these- I’m saving the other 2 glasses for another gift...unless I decide to use them myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: I like them.
customer_reviews.text: I do like my glasses. I tried the vinegar and water overnight process, but it left a very vinegar fragrance (probably wrong ratio). I then put them in the oven as suggested, and that did help. The slope of the openings is narrower than I am used to, but I think they will work for drinks on the deck. Overall, I am pleased with my purchase and I am looking forward to my toddler grandkids not breaking drink containers outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: L. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect outdoor glasses!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are perfect for any outing where you don't want breakables. They take up very little room since they can be crushed flat and then pop back into shape when you need them. They do have an odor when you first get them, but I did the oven trick and then washed them. The odor is negligible now and will like fade. Just heat them in a 300 degree oven for 3 minutes and then hand wash them. Handle them with care because they will be rather hot.
customer_reviews.author: D. Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Can't give it a 5....quite yet
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I think they're awesome! They are fun and Squishy to play with I don't have to worry about them breaking in the jacuzzi, but I did detect a slight aftertaste on my first glass. I think I'll run them through the dishwasher as recommended, but I honestly don't believe that there are going to be any problems.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Nice unbreakable wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our travel trailer. We figured with camping we needed cups in that are not breakable and are lightweight. These definitely do the job and fit the bill. The only issue that I have with them is if you put liquid in it more than halfway full and you accidentally squeeze the cup a little too hard then the liquid will spill over the top. Otherwise a great stemless unbreakable wine glass.
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Attracts dirt
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and did the job, however they collected dirt and dust like crazy. If you put them in a bag or anywhere that isn't perfectly clean, they will attract every last bit of dirt and will not be clean when you arrive for your picnic or whatever. Wasn't able to use them as much as I was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I used them on a overnight kayak ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I used them on a overnight kayak trip where space was very limited. They crush down into a little ball and pop right back to shape afterwards. I was able to dump my coffee cup and use this in its place. No heat transfer through the silicone! Several others have said they will be getting them soon.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D Kyser

customer_reviews.title: NO GLASS IN THE POOL
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. .. they even float in the pool. .. but the only thing I'd like to add to the design is a floating ring around the bottom, so as they float in the pool, they don't tip towards the opening, which exchanges your beverage for pool water. I'd also like a silicone margarita glass... where the stem may drop below the surface yet float the top well. Thus allowing the pool to cool drinks... either way. . NO GLASS IN THE POOL! which is great
customer_reviews.author: Gotham Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: The product was received exactly as described online with prompt delivery. There is no product smell at all, it's durable and easy to clean, sits solidly on the table, easy to grip with no slippage, does not discolor, and has lots of volume. I fold up the glass, put it in my pocket, and it's 100% ready to go when I need it. I especially liked that the product is BPA free and 100% top rated Food-Grade Silicone material. I thoroughly reviewed all of the Amazon offered silicon wine glasses, chose this vendor, and glad that I did. Highly recommend...
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Won’t break moving. Great for college.
customer_reviews.text: Love that they won’t break in moving or stowage in populated tight spaces. We don’t drink a drop of alcohol but are using them at college. Perfect for when I need a cup like for juice or a quick iced tea or scoop of slushy. I use insulated water bottles for just about everything else. These little silicone vessels are perfect form for the function!
customer_reviews.author: MrsPsp

customer_reviews.title: Wine or tea?  Hot or cold?
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and feel. They feel substantial. My suggestion would be to make the opening just a smidgen larger in diameter. Seems small. Afraid I'll spill while drinking. Haven't tried hot tea yet, but I will. Just... Still afraid I'll dribble...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to the park
customer_reviews.text: Love them that they easily fit in my purse. They stand solid. My only advice would be to not fill them too much until you are used to grabbing as they may spill from the top. Wishful thinking to have a little snap so when i fold it to put it in my purse it stays folded. I have used this for concerts in the park, and to the movie theatre when we are sharing a 5 gallon soda 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are cheaply made and stain easily. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tim8504

customer_reviews.title: I love these for the summer
customer_reviews.text: I love these for the summer. There is a slight smell of silicone initially but it goes away after a few washes. Also, the mouth of the glass is just a bit too small, I would suggest the maker make that larger. It’s hard to drink without the other side of the glass hitting your nose. But, they are used all the time in my house. We keep them in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Mjanaynay

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: These are going to be perfect for poolside and travel. I don’t always trust how hotel glasses are washed so I like to bring my own. These are ideal ( or will be when we can travel again).
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

customer_reviews.title: Huge Hit at Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as a gift for a wine enthusiast and they absolutely loved them! Easily the most "popular" gift this year just because nobody had seen it before. Super durable based on all the squeezing that was going on out of sheer fascination lol
customer_reviews.author: kcairns

customer_reviews.title: Perfect backpack cup!
customer_reviews.text: I had the Guyot Designs Squishy Bowl and Cup Set. The cup was about 2oz too small for me. The bowl was too big to drink out of. This one is just right, about the same volume as a wine glass. Texture wise it's about the same at the Guyot. It can completely collapse. However, it's firm enough to pick up full and drink out of for all but the someone with a gorilla grip.
customer_reviews.author: Fae Kname

customer_reviews.title: That are what you see, seem to be think ...
customer_reviews.text: That are what you see, seem to be thick enough to last I bought these for my wife and other family members that may want to be fancy on the trails when we ride! After your done you can squeeze them right into your pocket lol 👍 Thumps up!!
customer_reviews.author: I person buyer!

customer_reviews.title: The company replaced the small glassware with an updated design which is larger and a much better product. It does take some getting used to ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't find my original review which was negative. The company replaced the small glassware with an updated design which is larger and a much better product. It does take some getting used to the more pliable design but they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Too squishy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use by the pool. These silicone glasses are *very* squishy - if you were startled and squeezed the glass by mistake, all the wine would shoot out. A little too weird. I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Curing required before purchase
customer_reviews.text: The glasses require a detailed curing process including time in a oven. It was disappointing to find this out after receiving it especially when giving it as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Gary N

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my sister
customer_reviews.text: Unbreakable unless you have a a dog that likes to chew. It’s nice that they don’t break when they fall. Fit nicely in a suitcase. My sister really liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Weaver

customer_reviews.title: If you've got a clutz in the house, buy these!
customer_reviews.text: My missus tends to break stemware ... a lot. When I saw these I knew I had the perfect gift for her! Takes a little bit of getting used to holding, as the silicone gives a little, but you learn quickly. And no more broken glass for ME to step on! YAY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bamboo Dan

customer_reviews.title: Not gift-worthy, terrible presentation
customer_reviews.text: Not adequate to be given as a gift, unless you want to give a poorly packaged, cheap looking gift. If you’re buying for yourself, sure, but the presentation is terribly disappointing. The sturdiness also feels terrible, though we’re certainly not keeping them long enough to try.
customer_reviews.author: elisa timmerman

customer_reviews.title: Great unbreakable glasses !
customer_reviews.text: Great wine glasses for the beach / pool. Was afraid they would stain with red wine but worked great. They do have a chemical smell even after washing.. not a huge deal but does have the smell When drinking out of them. May try soaking in lemon juice mixture to see if would help. Will be buying these as gifts as well
customer_reviews.author: Margaret C.

customer_reviews.title: The idea is great, the smell
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great, the smell .... not so much, I still have them just in case but really don’t enjoy the smell they have and I’ve had them for over 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: CV

customer_reviews.title: Pure Junk!
customer_reviews.text: These are pure junk. I like the shape and that they can't break , but after using the a few times, the material became stained and they looked gross so I had to throw them out. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Opaque white color and not half blue
customer_reviews.text: These are opaque white but the picture looks like half of the glass is blue. I guess they are supposed to have red wine in them I guess. I would not have purchased these if I knew that they were white.
customer_reviews.author: kami keeling

customer_reviews.title: These glasses are quite tippy and they have a strange ...
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are quite tippy and they have a strange smell to them. The smell is similar to gasoline or a chemical. I had to hold my breath while sipping wine.
customer_reviews.author: Valli Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wino sister and she is in love already with them.
customer_reviews.author: Momofboys

customer_reviews.title: and they are good. Packable
customer_reviews.text: Had to test them before reviewing. I used them on a trip recently, and they are good. Packable, no plastic smell, no smell at all. Has a good base. So much nicer than the hotel plastic cups.
customer_reviews.author: A. Walls

customer_reviews.title: I like them.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set as a gift for a friend that has an RV. These won't break in transit, rattle or damage other dishes. They are a little tippy when empty but work well when filled with wine. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell K. Abston

customer_reviews.title: I love that they are durable and dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: Got these glasses for camping and campfires and pool days to cut down on the amount of wine glasses broken. I love that they are durable and dishwasher safe. I wish they were thinner around the edges. It feels like I'm drinking out of a bowl. Otherwise, does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Jessicaenglish

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for clumsy-itis
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that these silicone "glasses" are silicone- twice I have dumped my wine in them. There is an adjustment period from using stemware I guess, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Silent no more

customer_reviews.title: Genius!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for using outdoors, at the pool or any place you want to avoid glass. We plan to use them when we do cup-less trails runs. You can easily squeeze one into a pocket or waistband for use when you arrive at an aid station.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Mills

customer_reviews.title: Well-received adult gift.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as part of a gift exchange. It was not unheard of, but still unique enough to draw attention. I can't rate it five stars because I didn't get to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jake T

customer_reviews.title: A little tipsy
customer_reviews.text: Love the flexibility of the silicone wine glasses and that they can be put in the dishwasher, but the glasses are easily tipped over when gentley bumped. I have spilled a whole glass of wine as did one of our dinner guests. Waste of wine and a mess to clean up. Have gone back to glass for now and will be more cautious when using the silicone glasses. It would be nice if they had a wider base as they are very tipsy t
customer_reviews.author: Dajek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Traveling
customer_reviews.text: I bought these glasses as a gift for my friends who were visiting from Australia. They have been traveling around Australia for a year, in a small camper, and space is an issue. They loved these glasses because they are very packable and best of all, unbreakable! They took up very little space in the suitcase as they traveled back home to continue their journey. We rinsed them out and gave them a trial run and we noticed no odor that some other reviewers mentioned. My friends thought they were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: asmores1

customer_reviews.title: They are a gift for a clumsy person
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a gift for my mother. She is always knocking her glass over. Her birthday isn't till Feb so she hasn't seen them yet. From what I can tell they are pretty neat
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wine slush
customer_reviews.text: It's just great that you can pack them anywhere and freeze them.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them for my cousin and his fiance as a Bridal gift and they loved them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Different and fun
customer_reviews.text: I love them despite the flaws. Drinks with strong colour, smell, flavour should be avoided as they stick to the glasses. Otherwise they are fun to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best purchase
customer_reviews.text: The smell does not want to come out of these. I did all of the suggestions and they still smell bad.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Love these for travel and camping
customer_reviews.text: These are great for travel and camping since they're unbreakable, compact, and light weight. They're also sturdy enough to hold the fluid, which I have found is not the case with other silicone glasses. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan C.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: I can barely drink out of them they’re so small and they’re so squishy my drink spills..... don’t understand the hype of these, I’m not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Wilsonator

customer_reviews.title: Drunk proof
customer_reviews.text: The drunk people in your life can’t break them. No glass cuts, no tossing out the ice.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: It seems like my wife and my mom break about one wine ...
customer_reviews.text: It seems like my wife and my mom break about one wine glass a month, so this was a good gag yet useful gift for them. I wish they came in a box instead of a plastic bag for ease of wrapping, but it's easy enough to repackage them myself. Right out of the package I did notice any unpleasant odor at all. I think these will get a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Festus

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service EVER
customer_reviews.text: Get the larger, thicker glasses with the bigger opening. These people know wine and know how to enjoy it. Cheers to them!!
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like having silicone wine glasses so I won't accidentally drop and break them. They're easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Can pack them and go anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Can pack them and go anywhere! No glass to break. Takes a little to get used to holding the glass at the bottom, rather than at the top - but SO worth the learning curve!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, works terrific. I love it and I’m enjoying a nice glass of wine !
customer_reviews.author: Herbert R. Davila

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Was surprised these had no weird chemical taste ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Was surprised these had no weird chemical taste and fun to hold and drink from.
customer_reviews.author: Kami Ward

customer_reviews.title: We love to hike with a bottle of wine and a ...
customer_reviews.text: We love to hike with a bottle of wine and a couple glasses, but we kept breaking the nice plastic wine glasses we had. These are great-- indestructible, and way classier than drinking wine out of the alternatives. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Current

customer_reviews.title: Jokel made things right!
customer_reviews.text: i originally gave these glasses a not-so-good review because of the odor issue, and also because the mouth of these glasses was too small, making them hard to drink from. But after Jokel saw the review they reached out and told me how to get rid of the odor (by soaking in vinegar and water for several hours), and they sent me new glasses with a larger mouth. Great customer service, and I love the new glasses!
customer_reviews.author: sgoheen

customer_reviews.title: Good weight, good size
customer_reviews.text: Good weight, good size, reasonable strength, great value. Others have complained about smell or taste with silicone wine glasses. We could not appreciate even a hint of odor or taste with these glasses. We would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Tachenko

customer_reviews.title: wobbly
customer_reviews.text: I like them, they are definitely unbreakable and not too flimsy in the hand, but I bought them because I have three fairly rambunctious cats and multiple sets of five wine glasses. These tip too easily so now I have spillage instead of breakage.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda P

customer_reviews.title: Safe outdoor
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made. Have to get used to the feel in hand. Got for hardscape patio. No broken glass.
customer_reviews.author: K. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: We can't get the smell to go away even after soaking with vinegar/water. We'll be returning them soon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cool
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my MIL. She uses them when she goes out to get in the hot tub.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor loved her glasses! I had seen something similar growing up in Florida where everyone has a pool. The quality was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M.  Scoff Keel

customer_reviews.title: Great for around the pool!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. All of our guests enjoyed drinking wine out of the glasses while pool/spa side. I enjoyed not having to worry about broken glass by the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Great for the outdoors!
customer_reviews.text: Don't break, a little unstable with the set down sometimes. But overall very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: I'm super sensitive to smells so the residual odor is offputting
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these for our outdoor area and pool. They have a very weird odor and the package directions suggest cleaning them with vinegar/water solution. I'm super sensitive to smells so the residual odor is off putting, so these will be my hubby's glasses.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Not 13.5 oz
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, I like them a lot. They are even a little bit insulating, so you can hold hot liquids in them. One star off because they claim to be 13.5 oz and they are not. Filled all the way to the brim is only 12 oz, which is still a lot, but I was thinking I could get that much in and still have a civilized gap at the top to walk without spilling.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: No unpleasant surprises.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i expected. I wish that sounded like more of a rave review than it does, but I expected unbreakable, silicone wine glasses, and that is what i got. I am happy with my purchase. :)
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a birthday gift, we have used them while enjoy a hot tub, great product, I don't have to worry about breaking glass
customer_reviews.author: Challenger R/T

customer_reviews.title: Great! We originally purchased a set of these for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great! We originally purchased a set of these for use at our pool. We like them so much that we ordered another set for our motor coach. The company that makes/sells these is also top notch. It's a good deal all around.
customer_reviews.author: Arby

customer_reviews.title: These are great. They had a slight smell to them
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They had a slight smell to them, but the same day that I received them the seller contacted me to make sure they got to me and told me how to get rid of the smell! I can't wait to go camping. I am. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: MissNasty

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are a hit! I bought two sets of them. Works great for the jacuzzi and camping. The odor is not a big deal- I was able to remove it with a little bit of vinegar and water.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Safe drinking!
customer_reviews.text: Our crushable glasses are headed to Jamaica! They will keep us safe from broken glass.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Stundtner

customer_reviews.title: I really like these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I really like these glasses. Used them for the first time in Kansas at my sister's. They have a beautiful pool and it was so nice not to worry about breaking glass. The only downfall...it took quite a while to get rid of the smell of plastic. Eventually we did omit the smell and they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Bought these for pool time and they are exactly what is shown.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Spears

customer_reviews.title: Take Them Any and Everywhere
customer_reviews.text: These wine glasses are terrific! Easy to throw in a bag to take to friends' homes, or to enjoy our wine outdoors. I am no longer nervous to take a glass of wine out to our hot tub - they aren't glass, so they go any and everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: KAR

customer_reviews.title: Liked them at Air BnB. Bought them for home.
customer_reviews.text: We discovered these at an Air Bomb. I bought some -- a Christmas present to us -- so we could have them for the deck and the hammock.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Shuffle

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Un-Breakable!
customer_reviews.text: Fast Delivery, well packaged. We love these "glasses" I quote that cause although they appear to be glass they are actually kind of soft and more importantly, flexible. We can enjoy beer or wine out on our patio without the threat of shattered glass. They are great to put a little water in and freeze when you want a frosty cocktail or beer. Easy to wash and store. Buy a set today!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Tarullo

customer_reviews.title: My grandkids love them for juice
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love them for juice. Bought them for the pool yard but adults really don't like to drink wine from them. Expensive kiddie cups.
customer_reviews.author: cw3

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses. We use them around our hot tub
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses. We use them around our hot tub. They are perfect. Anybody looking for affordable, well made silicone wine glasses will be satisfied. They are the perfect weight and will feel right at home in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Trimmer

customer_reviews.title: They were a gift but I get goods comments on ...
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift but I get goods comments on them and pictures from the kids . They have a hot tub and liove using them out there!
customer_reviews.author: momDan

customer_reviews.title: ... silicone wine glasses as a christmas gift and she loved it. Very happy with your product
customer_reviews.text: Gave these silicone wine glasses as a christmas gift and she loved it. Very happy with your product, and the ease of ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Watkinsnc

customer_reviews.title: Easily packable
customer_reviews.text: Great for camping! Easy to pack, and no worries about breakage.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The glasses were a perfect compliment to my wine bag. Nothing like having some wine while enjoying the beach!
customer_reviews.author: raven

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for the Clumsy!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my aunt that is always breaking wine glasses and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: AmyCC96

customer_reviews.title: Not something I would ever use or gift
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning these. They were very cheaply made and not at all what I expected. I bought them for a gift but would have been embarrassed to gift them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: Very nice glasses, fill my needs for unbreakability and portability. One star off though because I wish the rim was a little bit wider or maybe my nose should be smaller.
customer_reviews.author: G. Pepin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome item at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome item at a great price. I enjoyed the fact that they included instruction on how to get rid of the "new" odor from the cups. Followed the directions and it worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: g. macky

customer_reviews.title: Cool wine glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are just cool because they can be used at the pool! They also do not have any plastic taste as I thought there might be.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They're fun, and squishy. And the smell goes away after a couple of washings...
customer_reviews.author: C. Jett

customer_reviews.title: Just as I’d hoped
customer_reviews.text: Got them for an xmas gift for a few couples in my family. They r exactly what I was looking for yet have not used them as they are a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: These stemless silicone glasses are great! Stylish
customer_reviews.text: These stemless silicone glasses are great! Stylish, flexible, and unbreakable, so much better looking than the usual plastic barware or (shudder!) red cups. You can freeze water in them for your evening cocktail - who needs ice cubes? I'll be getting more as gifts for friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design and pratical product with many applications!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! Jökel glasses arrive extremely quickly and I intend to use this unbreakable, packable and stylish glasses for picnics when we are hiking in Santa Fe and at Music On the Hill in Santa Fe. They will work GREAT and nicely designed! I'm sure we will receive questions as to where we purchased them! Too bad World Market doesn't sell them locally!
customer_reviews.author: David Rich

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loved them and thought they were a clever idea
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as gifts for my girlfriends for Christmas. Everyone loved them and thought they were a clever idea. I even bought one for myself. I can't wait to try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Michele O.

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment - - we shall see
customer_reviews.text: I haven't actually used them yet but the top opening appears to be much smaller than I anticipated. A disappointment - - we shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son and his wife and they loved them
customer_reviews.author: Thressa

customer_reviews.title: great idea for travel or use around the pool!
customer_reviews.text: Really cool glasses! Received them in lightening speed; great customer service. Love them! Gave them as a gift; ordering me a couple of sets too, now!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Camping friendly
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to keep in our camping trailer. Sturdy products that can also go in the dishwasher (which I love) great product for a great price
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Johnson

customer_reviews.title: 😊
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my parents who travel with their Motorhome a lot. Perfect for what they needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far just a funny conversation piece
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use on the boat, a few more months of winter to go. So far just a funny conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Rozniewski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. Friend loves them especially as she is known for breaking glasses
customer_reviews.author: allison kaiman
